SELECT REQUESTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS requestNo FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO REQUESTS_T( REQUEST_NO, REQUEST_SORT, REQUEST_DATE, REASON, REQUEST_STATUS, reject_REASON, PIC_NO, EMPLOYEE_NO ) VALUES ( #{requestNo}, #{requestSort}, CURRENT_DATE, #{reason}, #{requestStatus}, null, #{picNo}, #{employees.employeeNo} )

INSERT INTO LEAVE_REQUEST_T( REQUEST_NO, START_DATE, END_DATE, DURATION, LEAVE_TYPE, NAME, DEPART_NAME, RANK_TITLE ) VALUES ( #{requests.requestNo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{duration}, #{leaveType}, #{requests.employees.name}, #{requests.employees.depart.departName}, #{requests.employees.rank.rankTitle} )
INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE_ADJUSTMENT_REQUEST_T( REQUEST_NO, ADJUSTMENT_DATE, TIME_IN, TIME_OUT) VALUES( #{requests.requestNo}, #{adjustmentDate}, #{timeIn}, #{timeOut})

INSERT INTO REQUEST_ATTACH_T ( ATTACH_NO, UPLOAD_PATH, FILESYSTEM_NAME, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, REQUEST_NO) VALUES( REQUEST_ATTACH_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{uploadPath}, #{filesystemName}, #{originalFileName}, #{requestNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT R.REQUEST_SORT, R.REQUEST_DATE, R.REASON, R.reject_REASON, R.PIC_NO, R.EMPLOYEE_NO, R.REQUEST_NO,NAME, D.DEPART_NAME, RA.RANK_TITLE, R.REQUEST_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY R.REQUEST_NO DESC) AS RN, R.REQUEST_NO, R.REQUEST_SORT, R.REQUEST_DATE, R.REASON, R.reject_REASON, R.PIC_NO, R.EMPLOYEE_NO,R.REQUEST_STATUS, E.NAME, E.DEPARTMENT_NO, E.RANK_NO FROM REQUESTS_T R INNER JOIN EMPLOYEES_T E ON R.EMPLOYEE_NO = E.EMPLOYEE_NO ) R INNER JOIN DEPARTMENTS_T D ON R.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO INNER JOIN RANKS_T RA ON R.RANK_NO = RA.RANK_NO WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT L.REQUEST_NO, L.START_DATE, L.END_DATE, L.LEAVE_TYPE, R.REQUEST_SORT, R.REQUEST_DATE, R.REASON, R.REQUEST_STATUS, R.reject_REASON, R.PIC_NO, R.EMPLOYEE_NO, L.NAME,L.RANK_TITLE, L.DEPART_NAME,A.ATTACH_NO,A.UPLOAD_PATH,A.FILESYSTEM_NAME, A.ORIGINAL_FILENAME FROM LEAVE_REQUEST_T L INNER JOIN REQUESTS_T R ON L.REQUEST_NO = R.REQUEST_NO LEFT JOIN REQUEST_ATTACH_T A ON L.REQUEST_NO = A.REQUEST_NO WHERE L.REQUEST_NO = #{requestNo}

SELECT R.REQUEST_NO, R.REQUEST_STATUS, R.REASON, R.REQUEST_SORT, PIC_NO, R.REJECT_REASON, REQUEST_DATE, A.TIME_IN, A.TIME_OUT, A.ADJUSTMENT_DATE, E.NAME,E.EMPLOYEE_NO, E.DEPARTMENT_NO, E.RANK_NO, D.DEPART_NAME,RA.RANK_TITLE, AT.ATTACH_NO, AT.UPLOAD_PATH, AT.FILESYSTEM_NAME, AT.ORIGINAL_FILENAME, AT.DOWNLOAD_COUNT FROM REQUESTS_T R INNER JOIN ATTENDANCE_ADJUSTMENT_REQUEST_T A ON R.REQUEST_NO = A.REQUEST_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEES_T E ON R.EMPLOYEE_NO = E.EMPLOYEE_NO INNER JOIN DEPARTMENTS_T D ON E.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO INNER JOIN RANKS_T RA ON E.RANK_NO = RA.RANK_NO INNER JOIN REQUEST_ATTACH_T AT ON R.REQUEST_NO = AT.REQUEST_NO WHERE R.REQUEST_NO = #{requestNo}

SELECT R.REQUEST_SORT, R.REQUEST_DATE, R.REASON, R.reject_REASON, R.PIC_NO, R.EMPLOYEE_NO, R.REQUEST_NO,NAME, D.DEPART_NAME, RA.RANK_TITLE, R.REQUEST_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY R.REQUEST_NO DESC) AS RN, R.REQUEST_NO, R.REQUEST_SORT, R.REQUEST_DATE, R.REASON, R.reject_REASON, R.PIC_NO, R.EMPLOYEE_NO,R.REQUEST_STATUS, E.NAME, E.DEPARTMENT_NO, E.RANK_NO FROM REQUESTS_T R INNER JOIN EMPLOYEES_T E ON R.EMPLOYEE_NO = E.EMPLOYEE_NO ) R INNER JOIN DEPARTMENTS_T D ON R.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO INNER JOIN RANKS_T RA ON R.RANK_NO = RA.RANK_NO WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT REQUEST_NO, REQUEST_DATE, REQUEST_STATUS, reject_REASON, START_DATE, END_DATE, DURATION, LEAVE_TYPE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY L.REQUEST_NO DESC) AS RN, L.REQUEST_NO, R.REQUEST_DATE, R.REQUEST_STATUS, R.reject_REASON, L.START_DATE, L.END_DATE, L.DURATION, L.LEAVE_TYPE FROM LEAVE_REQUEST_T L INNER JOIN REQUESTS_T R ON R.REQUEST_NO = L.REQUEST_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEES_T E ON R.EMPLOYEE_NO = E.EMPLOYEE_NO WHERE E.EMPLOYEE_NO = #{employeeNo} ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE LEAVE_REQUEST_T SET DEPART_NAME = #{requests.employees.depart.departName ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{requests.employees.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANK_TITLE = #{requests.employees.rank.rankTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEAVE_TYPE = #{leaveType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_DATE = #{startDate, jdbcType=DATE}, END_DATE = #{endDate, jdbcType=DATE}, DURATION = #{duration, jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE REQUEST_NO = #{requests.requestNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}
